transcript:
Hello?
Hello? Sir, meri Faizal ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Han ji.
Faizal ji, main IndiaMART se baat kar raha tha, servicing team se sir. Actually sir, mujhe aapka feedback dikha. Aapne mail kiya tha na feedback ki jo aapke paas leads vagarah aa rahi hai, wo maximum retailers ke leads aa rahi hai. To usi ke regarding maine call kiya tha.
Hmm.
To sir, aapko yahi concern hai ki jo bhi aap leads vagarah istemal kar rahe hain, mainly wo zyada tar kam pieces ki lead hai?
Hmm.
To mujhe bata sakte hain sir aap sabse pehle to deal all over India karte hain?
Isme dekhiye, isme zyada tar main maximum buyer to dekh raha hu ek to unke paas GST nahi hai, pehli baat to ye. Aur dusri quantity nahi hai, dusri quantity nahi hai.
Okay.
Thik hai, wo retailer bhare hue hain.
Samajh gaya.
To aapka jo dealing hoti hai wo pan India rehti hai?
Ji?
Aap sir jo deal jo karte hain wo pan India rehta hai, all over India karte hain ya sirf limited hai kuch cities mein?
Nahi nahi, all India, all India mein dekhta hu.
All India karte hain. Thik hai, to sir sabse pehle jaise aapne mujhe bataya ki aap mujhe keh rahe the ki GST nahi hai. To hum ek kaam kar sakte hain lead type ka ek filter aata hai buyleads mein. Waha na hum GST GST ka wo dete hain.
Ha, wo mujhe malum hai, wo maine sab karke dekha hua hai. Jis phir to phir wo without GST wale hi buyer hote hain. Phir GST to check karo to phir koi hai hi nahi usse related hamare product se related.
But jaise ek aapka product hai glass beads ka. Ek lead aa rakhi hai Onyx Agate Beads Real Glass Beads. Ye GST verified lead hai. Chennai, Tamil Nadu ka buyer hai.
Ha, wo main samajh gaya.
Ji. Par ye 30 kg ki iski quantity hai. Aapki minimum order quantity kitni rehti hai?
Minimum order glass mein 30 kg, lekin glass beads mein hazaro product hai na. Usme hamare se related hai nahi wo dekhna padta hai.
Achha jaise isme inhone likh rakha tha Onyx Agate Beads Real Glass Beads.
Hmm.
Inki requirement ye thi.
Achha achha.
Onyx Agate. Aur kis tarah ki need karte hain aap?
Okay.
Thik hai, koi issue nahi hai. To sir sabse pehle jo aap mujhe bata rahe hain ki aap filters vagarah use karke dekh chuke hain. To hum ek kaam kar sakte hain sir agar aapko itna issue face ho raha hai. Sabse pehle to jo aapke account manager hain, jaise hi wo aati hain, main unko bolunga ki jo bhi aapki zyada tar zyada jo pieces ki lead ho jaise hazar pieces ki lead hogi, 2000 pieces ki lead hogi, waise mujhe leads aapko ek bar share kar de WhatsApp pe. Taki ek rahega ki aap zyada tar wahi istemal karenge aur aapko sort out karne ki need nahi hogi.
Nahi to lead nahi to leads mein wo sort out karna mujhe koi problem nahi hai, wo main kar leta hu wo.
Achha. Thik hai, wo to achhi baat hai sir. But phir bhi ek aapki bhi help ho jayegi. Hamari taraf se ki hum jo abhi aapko lead share wo koi leads aati hai to usme kai bar to mail aa jate hain. Aur usme product pe click karke wo main dekh leta hu latest buyleads.
Achha.
Matlab aapne sare filters istemal karke check kar liye hain? Kuch aisa jo aapko lag nahi raha aapke kaam ka ho?
Main check karte rehta hu.
Achha, thik hai sir. Achhi baat hai aap check kar pa rahe hain. Baki sir main ye bhi check kar pa raha tha catalog views mein bhi aapka ek koi product kisi buyer ne search kiya tha square glass beads ka.
Ha, wo main dekh raha hu.
Ji, to aap catalog views mein jaake bhi dekh sakte hain. Ek bar still aap kahenge to main aapke account manager ko bol dunga ki ek bar aapko short list karke ek list aapko bata de over the call ya phir aapko WhatsApp pe send kar le leads batane ke liye.
Itna hum aapki taraf apni taraf se ek help kar sakte hain aapki taki itna aapko filter out na karna pade cheeze.
Hmm.
Aur do teen filters aise jaise order value ka. Usme agar aap above 50000 karenge na to bhi aapko main ek se 2 lakh wali lead dikhengi.
Hmm.
Aur secondly GST ka jo filter hai lead type mein, use aap zarur istemal kariye agar aapko sirf GST wali hi wo chahiye to. Usse sir kafi ho jayega ki main use karta hu sir, main use karta hu.
Thik hai, chaliye achhi baat hai. Baki koi aur doubt hoga to aap apne account manager ya mujhe is number pe contact kar lena filhal. Sir abhi jaise mere ek lead aayi hui hai square glass beads ki, thik hai. Ek ke paas inke paas bhi GST nahi hai, Muzaffarpur Bihar se aaya hua hai. Abhi do minute pehle aaya hai.
To do minute pehle lead aa rakhi hai, kis cheez ki hai?
Square glass.
Ye Real glass beads pata nahi mujhe nahi share kar GST GST ke bina to kaam hota nahi hai.
Nahi sir, bilkul GST ke bagair kaam hota nahi hai.
Haa.
To wahi isliye maine aapko suggest kiya ki agar aapko sirf GST wali lead hi istemal karni hai to aap GST ka filter lagaye rakhe aur GST wali lead hi istemal kare.
Nahi nahi wo ho sakta hai bagair GST without GST bhi kar sakte hain lekin samne wale ko bhi to trust nahi hoga na, trust issue aayega.
Sir wo to dekhiye aap baat karenge unki requirement janenge tabhi aapko kuch unke bare mein bhi pata chalega aur unko bhi aapke bare mein pata chalega. Main samajh gaya. Kyunki starting mein kyunki sir starting mein na jo bhi IndiaMART hai basically aapko bhi pata hai match making platform hai. Connect karwa zarur karwa sakta hai aapko buyers ke sath lekin deals convert karna aapka main kaam hai ye. Ha main wo main samajh gaya deal convert karna.
Hum bas aapko buyer ka detail dete hain.
Hmm.
Baki thik hai, main aapki baat samajh gaya aap ek kaam zarur kariye ki aap GST ka filter laga ke hi agar aapko aisa lag raha hai ki trust issues ho sakta hai. Main main sare filter use karta hu jo jo mujhe requirement hota hai.
Hmm.
Main karta hu ji. Thik hai aur koi issue to nahi aa raha na sir aapko in cheez ke alawa? Aur kuch nahi bas isme yahi tha ki isme retailer customer bahut hai jaise bag mein hamare paas item hai bag document organizer. Isko dekhta hu ek ek piece do do piece abhi to aa bhi nahi rahe lead. To buyleads jo aa rahe the pehle to wo bhi ek do piece wale zyada aa rahe the.
Hmm.
Balk wale bahut kam dikh rahe the isliye main wo. Achha aur sir ye main kuch products aise bhi check kar raha tha jaise file bags ho gaya, gadget organizer bag ho gaya aur multi purpose bag jo hai na is naam se aap leads kafi zyada istemal kar rahe hain lekin aapne add nahi kar rakha apne catalog mein.
Actually mere paas document organizer bag hai. Achha. To customer ke actual need kya hai wo main contact karke phir baat karta hu. Ha wo main samajh gaya but main ek kaam karta hu ki jaise aapne file bag aur jo jo maine aapko naam bataya hai na us naam se main aapke catalog mein at least ye products add kar deta hu taki is naam se bhi agar koi aapke paas leads aaye na to aapko directly visible ho. Ha ha wo chalega, wo chalega.
Ji.
Wo chalega. Baki sir jo main check aapne bataya na hota hai na ek ek product hai usko log kai usko kis naam se. Ha nahi wo main samajh gaya. Ha multiple. Bilkul. Isliye maine aapko kaha ki sir ye zarur ho sakta hai ki aapko kisi aur naam se aapne bhi add kar rakha ho aur kisi aur naam se aapko lead dikh rahi ho same product ki. To hum ye bhi option dete hain ki agar aapko jitne bhi aapko lagta hai jis naam se bhi buyer search karta hai utni hum categories aapke similar product mein add kar dete hain taki jis bhi naam se aapko visible ho.
Yes yes.
Baki sir calls vagarah ka kya wo chal raha hai aapka mail? Calls vagarah directly aap receive kar pa rahe hain abhi?
Hmm, calls to nahi aati hain, call mujhe karna padta hai.
Achha, kyuki abhi visibility thodi banne mein time lagta hai na. October mein main check kar pa raha tha ki yaar do leads do calls aayi thi. Ek aapne miss kar di thi and ek aapne uthai thi. To koshish kariye sir miss na ho aapki taraf se calls.
Okay. Warna buyer agar profile pe dekhta hai na ki itna response rate hai sabse zyada response rate walon ko hi wo call karta hai.
Hmm.
Achha ek last cheez jo main aapse sir puchna chahunga ek wo hai ki sir lead manager pe bhi thoda bahut aap check kariye direct inquiries bhi aati hai lead manager pe. Unko bhi contact karte rahiye, baat karte rahiye unse ho sakta hai waha kuch aapko bada order mil jaye. Aur ye bhi ho sakta hai ki man lijiye agar koi chota order de raha hai na banda to wo aage jaake khud future mein aapse bada order lega. Kyunki koi bhi naya buyer aayega na sir trust ka thoda sa usme rehta hai. But definitely aage jaake wo bada order zarur deta hai.
Ji ji. Ji. Aur sir aapki ratings aur reviews mein check kar pa raha tha. Aapke char buyer ne aapko ratings and review de rakhi hai. Ek aapka Patna Bihar se, Vishakhapatnam se, ek Indore se. Bas ek Mintu Kumar hai sir. Wo actually Mintu Kumar wo Mintu Kumar ne jo rating diya hai na us time tak main member bhi nahi tha. Maine subscription baad mein liya hai wo usse pehle ki baat hai. Achha. Ha main dekha, maine dekha wo. Koi issue nahi sir. Usse pehle ki baat hai maine mere meri koi inquiry thi to unka reply shayad main nahi de paya tha wo us par unhone rating diya tha wo is tarah. Koi dikkat nahi hai sir. Aap bas ek kaam karna jinse bhi aap jis bhi buyer se aapki baat hoti hai na unse at least ratings review zarur mangiye. Taki jitne bhi five stars honge na utna aapka better jo abhi main check kar pa raha hu 3.8 out of five hai. Wo na number badh jayega automatically zyada ratings and reviews se.
Hmm.
Direct inquiries zarur check kariye buyleads mein samajh sakta hu thodi waha dikkat aa rahi hai. Abhi visibility jaise ban jayegi calls aane chalu ho jayenge wapsi aapke paas. Aur baki ratings and review ka dhyan rakhiye. Koi bhi issue aata hai aap mujhe call kar sakte hain in between ya apne account manager ko aap call kar sakte hain. Isme aisa kuch hai kya nahi buyer zyada aaye uske liye kuch kuch koi kuch kuch process matlab apni taraf se kuch activity kuch aise. Ji.
Sir dekhiye IndiaMART se na jaise aap suppose aap aaye IndiaMART pe aapne join kiya IndiaMART to hum aapko karte kya hain sabse pehle to hamari welcome call hoti hai usme aapko suggest karte hain ki aap services istemal karna mat band kariye kyuki jaise hi aap services istemal karna band kar dete hain waise aapki visibility down ho jati hai. Aur abhi jo main check kar pa raha hu aap services achhe se istemal kar rahe hain to kahin na kahin aapki visibility achhi khasi ban rahi hai.
Hmm.
Aur kya kehte hain jo isme jo buyleads mein dekhte hain jo bhi product visible hote hain English mein to ye jitne jitne buyer hai sare show ho rahe hain na matlab usse related? Matlab main samjha nahi kya kehna kya puchna cha rahe hain aap? Matlab lead manager hai na lead manager. Ji ji ji lead manager hai. Buyleads buyleads latest buyleads. Buyleads achha ji ji. Ha to to ye to all over India jo bhi log wo sare display ho rahe hain. Bilkul. Jo requirement hai. Bilkul all over India pe jinhone bhi requirement dal rakhi hai filhal hal filhal mein wo sare aapko lead manager buyleads pe show hote hain. Aur jaise hi wo lead aap istemal kar lete hain wo aapke lead manager mein chala jata hai taki unse aap baat kar sake. Nahi nahi wo to main samajh raha hu wo main samajh raha hu. Ji.
Thik hai, baki koi aur issue to nahi hai sir? Nahi aur koi issue nahi hai. Chaliye achhi baat hai. Kuch bhi doubt ya concern ho to aap mujhe is number pe call kar sakte hain ya otherwise apne account manager ko bhi kar sakte hain. Achha sir aapka jo aapne feedback diya tha na hamare yaha pe ek concern raise ho gaya tha. To us concern ko hum close kar sakte hain? Ha kar dijiye close. Chaliye thik hai sir iske baad na aapke mere concern close karne ke baad aapke paas ek feedback aayega over the mail. Aap please us pe positive response dijiyega. Okay. Okay sir, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads are mostly from retailers.

- Most buyers do not have GST.

- Leads are for smaller quantities.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested using GST filter in buyleads.

- Executive offered to add products to catalog.

- Executive will ask account manager to share leads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive feedback form over email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, gst, catalog, filters, ratings
